remarks: The subword of a concatenation of two words within the first of the concatenated words.  (Contributed by AV, 31-May-2018.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro/AV, 21-Oct-2018.)
statement:
swrdccatind.l $e |- ( ph -> ( # ` A ) = L ) $.
swrdccatind.w $e |- ( ph -> ( A e. Word V /\ B e. Word V ) ) $.
swrdccatin1d.1 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ( 0 ... N ) ) $.
swrdccatin1d.2 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( 0 ... L ) ) $.
swrdccatin1d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A concat B ) substr <. M , N >. ) = ( A substr <. M , N >. ) ) $.
